import React from "react"; import { useCartContext } from "../../context/context"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {DivImg,DIV,DivRounded} from './CarritoCss' import accounting from "accounting"; import { FaTrashAlt } from "react-icons/fa"; const Carrito = () => { const { cart, precioTotal, removeItem, clearCart } = useCartContext(); return ( <>

Carrito

{precioTotal === 0 ? ( <>

Su carrito se encuentra vacio

) : null} {cart.map((product, i) => (
{product.item.nombre}
Precio: ${product.item.precio}
Cantidad: {product.cantidad}
Subtotal: ${product.item.precio * product.cantidad}
))} {cart.length > 0 && ( <>

Total a pagar: {accounting.formatMoney(precioTotal)}

Ir a finalizar Compra )}
); }; export default Carrito;
